name: Don't get Full the Eating Contest
name_original: Don't get Full the Eating Contest
description:
Fat Guy es un tipo que le gusta comer.

Para demostrar su maestría en las artes digestivas se adentrará dentro de una competición de comer y debará derrotar a temibles contrincantes para halzarse con la victoria.

Lo único que Fat Guy deberá tener en cuenta que su estomago soporta un límite y si se queda sin espacio en él, será descalificado.

Fat Guy is a guy who likes to eat.

To demonstrate his mastery of the digestive arts, he will enter a eating competition and will have to defeat fearsome opponents to be victorious.

The only thing that Fat Guy must take into account is that his stomach supports a limit and if he runs out of space in it, he will be disqualified.
